CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Surplus_Lines_Policy__c = TRUE, RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale"), (Premium__c - MGA_Commission__c - Commission_New__c ) , IF(AND(Surplus_Lines_Policy__c = TRUE, RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Scale"), (Premium__c - Commission_New__c + Policy_Fee__c + Wholesale_Fee__c), ( Total_Cost__c ) - Commission_New__c - FS_Fees__c - Program_Fee__c ))
CustomField.label: Payable
